text: "Rock 'n' Roll Fantasy" is a 1979 song by British band Bad Company and is the leading single from their fifth studio album Desolation Angels. It went to number 13 in the United States, number 16 in Canada and number 65 in Australia. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Arena rock songs Category:Bad Company songs
title: Rock 'n' Roll Fantasy
